title: 90/187/EEC: Commission Decision of 20 April 1990 amending Decision 90/161//EEC concerning certain protection measures relating to classical swine fever in Belgium
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 20 April 1990
amending Decision 90/161//EEC concerning certain protection measures relating to classical swine fever in Belgium
(90/187/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Member States shall amend the measures which they apply to trade so as to bring them into compliance with this Decision. They shall immediately inform the Commission thereof.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 20 April 1990.
For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
